name: Flying Monster Truck 3d Simulator
description:
Flying Monster Truck 3d Simulator

Ready to go for the New Adventure in monster truck,download this Monster Truck Real Racing Game.

If you are a fanatic fan of flying bus, dragons and muscle carriage driving games then download this free flying monster Truck game today.

In this game you’re driving a flying pickup truck, once you reach flight speed you can fly your pickup truck like an airplane. Freestyle parking with extreme Turbo service vehicles.Back to your Future. Fly around the world travel beautiful landscapes be the best pilot.

Get ready to enjoy an invigorating flying Monster truck game with the blend of adventurous flying games in one of the best flying games.

Key Features:

=> User Friendly Game
=> Improve Airplane Flight Ability
=> Easy Controlling
=> Stunning HD Graphics
=> Advanced aircraft flight physics
